channel.title: Cockatrice
channel.description: So on my character I have 10 defense which I wish to keep I have been doing slayer to keep my mind off the boring task of leveling strength but I ran into a problem. I have been assigned cockatrice a slayer monster that recommends the mirror shield. The mirror shield requires 20 defense. Is it possible to slay these monsters without the mirror shield I am planning on going with sharks and super stat restores I don't want to waste my time if its not possible.

item.title: Cockatrice
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

Cockatrice… Lol
Immaturity Session over. do what Pure_ said.

Read full topic

item.title: Cockatrice
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:7, topic:388281”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=484105.msg3546891#msg3546891 date=1301244622]
or the canifis one iirc

edit:

<Pure_> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484105.0.html
<Pure_> say
<Pure_> have someone bring them to low hp
<Pure_> run away
<Pure_> the person with the last hit gets the slayer xp
[/quote]
No, they each get half, I believe.[/quote]

you still get the slayer kill though i think, which matters the most since she isnt killing them for xp, rather to just finish the task

Read full topic
